desc: WholeGrain Cycles presents Jack the bike rack, a front rack that carries your things so you don't have to. It fits most if not all bikes with standard handle bars using just two straps. Jack might just be the worlds most versatile front rack.

layout.text: We made JACK The Bike Rack fit as many bikes as we could so you will only ever need one, no matter how many bikes you have. So now you can get one for your palls too;)
